file_content.text: Greetings, Matriarch. Master Orgus Din has sent me to help you fight the Flesh Raiders.
So the Jedi finally deign to recognize my people's suffering? How noble.
Nothing to do with the attack on your training grounds, I'm sure.
We didn't realize how great a threat the Flesh Raiders had become.
I won't lie--it does.
And now you seek help from the people you once ignored.
How did you learn about the attack? It only just happened.
You know about that?
We heard the sounds of your battle. Watched the attack from a safe distance. Now you know what we endure.
I'm not here to be lectured by you.
Don't take that tone.
No--you've come to gain our trust. Learn about your new enemy.
My scouts have tracked the Flesh Raiders for months. Watched them grow in strength.
I will share what we've discovered, but only if you agree to protect my people. We... we suffer....
Mother, you need rest. Let me carry this burden for you.
With all due respect, time is a factor. I need that information.
My mission is urgent.
The Matriarch appears sick. Does she need a doctor?
What's wrong?
Thank you, but we have our own healers.
Let's hope you're more agreeable.
Anything would be better.
You'll find our people stand as one.
This is my daughter, Ranna Tao'Ven. She and Scout Chief Moorint here will speak for me.
I must attend to... other matters....
Personally, I don't care why you've come--as long as you destroy the Flesh Raiders.
Ever since they got their new weapons and gear, they hunt us like animals.
The enemy has a camp in the valley nearby. My scouts say the Flesh Raiders store their weapons and other tech in a cave.
Removing that technology will neutralize the Flesh Raiders.
I'll take care of it.
Nice of them to keep everything in one place. Makes it easier to destroy.
How convenient.
Destroying the weapons won't be enough. They'll just get more.
That might be worth my time.
They're slaughtering us with their technology. You want our help? Deal with it.
We need to strike fear into the Flesh Raiders. Sabotage their weapons. Fix it so they blow up in their ugly faces....
How would we do that?
Their technology is standard Republic design. We could overload the power circuits and plasma coils. Here, I'll show you....
Sabotage would thin the Flesh Raider numbers and eliminate their technological advantage.
If you brought that technology here, we could defend ourselves with those weapons.
This village is vulnerable to attack. You need better defenses.
More resources would help you.
Either one of those plans could work.
You both make strong cases.
My people aren't afraid to fight for their homes--we just lack the means.
You wouldn't know what to do with weapons like those.
You're too dumb for weapons.
We've survived persecution before. We can fight, but we need better weapons.
This debate is pointless unless you can get inside that cave. You'll need one of the leaders' access keys.
Find the Flesh Raider technology and do what you think is best. Good luck, Master Jedi.
All are welcome in our settlement.
